plot: His assistant in gun related coma, guilt stricken private investigator Jack Taylor leaves Galway for Dublin where he helps a young girl whose mother has been murdered.
title: Jack Taylor: Shot Down
plot_es: His assistant in gun related coma, guilt stricken private investigator Jack Taylor leaves Galway for Dublin where he helps a young girl whose mother has been murdered.
plot_en: His assistant in gun related coma, guilt stricken private investigator Jack Taylor leaves Galway for Dublin where he helps a young girl whose mother has been murdered.
